modal.create-description: Creating {subject} list having {address} as address.
modal.update-description: Updating {subject} list having {address} as address.
modal.close-description: Do you really want to close the {subject} list having {address} as address.
modal.update-warning: Current configuration will be overrided with the selected groups:

description.waiting: Please wait. This operation can take up to 30 seconds.

1.error-creating-list: List creation failed due to an unknown reason. Please contact your administrator.
1.no-owners: ESCO-SympaRemote could not affect a owner group to the list, because the filter from ESCO-SympaRemote config did not return any group.
1.no-subscribers: ESCO-SympaRemote could not affect a subscriber group to the list, because the filter from the known models database did not return any existing group.
1.operation-not-supported: The required operation is unknown (the only operation known for now is CREATE).
1.unknown-list-type: The type of list whose creation was requested is unknown (it is not present in the database containing the models).
1.list-creation-failed: List creation failed due to an unknown reason.
1.bad-configuration:
There is a problem in ESCO-SympaRemote configuration. Potential causes are :
  • a missing parameter
  • an invalid parameter
  • LDAP or MySQL access are incorrect
  • dome data in the model database is incorrect.
1.unauthorized-policy: The provided write policy (nice write scenario) is not among the policies allowed in the configuration file.

1.error-updating-list: List update failed due to an unknown reason. Please contact your administrator.
1.no-owners: ESCO-SympaRemote could not affect a owner group to the list, because the filter from ESCO-SympaRemote config did not return any group.
1.no-subscribers: ESCO-SympaRemote could not affect a subscriber group to the list, because the filter from the known models database did not return any existing group.
1.operation-not-supported: The required operation is unknown (the only operation known for now is CREATE).
1.unknown-list-type: The type of list whose update was requested is unknown (it is not present in the database containing the models).
1.list-creation-failed: List creation failed due to an unknown reason.
1.bad-configuration:
There is a problem in ESCO-SympaRemote configuration. Potential causes are :
  • a missing parameter
  • an invalid parameter
  • LDAP or MySQL access are incorrect
  • dome data in the model database is incorrect.
1.unauthorized-policy: The provided write policy (nice write scenario) is not among the policies allowed in the configuration file.

1.error-closing-list: An error happened when closing the list.

error-messages.400: An error has occurred, please try again.
error-messages.401: You are not logged in, please login.
error-messages.403: You are not authorized to access these resources.
error-messages.500: An internal server error has occurred, please try again later.
error-messages.503: The server is temporarily unavailable, please try again later.

error-messages-fallback: An error has occurred, please try again.
